311.review: I bought this camera twice, one for each of my daughters. They both have used them for different activities. One took action shots for the school yearbook and the other more pictures of family and friends. The camera is easy to use and takes great pictures.
311.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

312.author: Pshizzle
312.review: I took me a little bit to figure out how to use it, but the lenses are easy to put on and take off! It is an amazing camera, a very high quality and I have loved every moment with it! I would recommend and if I didn't buy it and was looking for a camera right now I would repurchase!
312.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

313.author: John
313.review_title: Great camera - better than 90% of Cell phones
313.review: The camera comes with two lenses which can be easily changed for close up and distant pictures. The automatic focus results in exceptionally clear images and the more distant lens seems to be unaffected by minor shaking. Great camera!
313.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

314.author: StacyH
314.review: I am a beginner photographer and wanted to find a good camera to start with. The Canon T6 made it so easy for me to learn, and the autofocus really helps take a great picture! I am overly satisfied, especially when I take pictures of landscapes. Pictures are crisp and clear.
314.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

315.author: Sarnben
315.review: So far after just having this camera for 3 weeks I'm SO glad I chose this one! The wifi sold me for sure! You can bring your shots right over to your phone and upload them super fast! My father in-law ended up buying the same exact one because he liked mine so much!
315.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

316.author: Editor13
316.review_title: This is a really good setup for basic photography
316.review: When I purchased this camera to use for news coverage, I was a little discouraged, thinking I would not get my money's worth, but honestly, I have. I'm impressed with this camera's capabilities. My only wish is that I could attach an external mic to use for video coverage.
316.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

317.author: dmk4life
317.review_title: A special gift for my Granddaughter!
317.review: This purchase was a special gift for my Granddaughter. She says it takes beautiful pictures and seems very pleased with it. Also, after a bit of research and some input from my oldest son, it seemed like a pretty good value.
317.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

318.author: pwhiterv
318.review: This was my first real Camera of any quality, My daughter started playing volleyball and I wanted something that would allow me to capture her in motion and action, it has done the job great.
318.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

319.author: Sunshine14115
319.review: This camera is great for doing photoshoots without a photographer! We were able to use the app to remotely take pictures and the quality of the pictures were awesome. If you're looking for a clear, sharp image and ease of use...this is the camera for you!
319.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

320.author: GoBrien
320.review:
I had a Canon for 10 years and need a new camera so I bought another Canon. After, bring it home I was not happy with the quality of the photos. The lines really needs to have a stabilizer on it and the new camera didn't '-( 
so I returned it and get the Nikon D3400 GREAT Camera.
320.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

321.author: NWilde
321.review: I took an online digital photography course...this was a great camera (and deal) for the price! I’ve enjoted getting to know the ins and outs of photography; this is a nice beginner’s camera to learn on. It’ll last for a long time to come, I think!
321.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

322.author: KidHub
322.review_title: best bang for first timers buck
322.review: been researching camera's for a while for my fiance and after talking to many of my friends that are professional photographers they recommended this for a first timer to use. it has everything you could need and will give her the photos she wants with ease.
322.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

323.author: LVGJ
323.review: This is my third Canon SLR. I have always liked this brand and its cameras. I decided to buy this bundle kit as the price was very good. It is got some additional features that my previous cameras did not have, but in general the settings are pretty familiar. Highly recommended.
323.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

324.author: DBQHawk
324.review: My daughter recently got interested in photography. She did the research and found that this would be a great starter camera for her. So far she loves it for it's ease of use and multi funtionality.
324.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

325.author: mils
325.review: I love this camera. its a great starter camera and its really easy to use. been able to get some great shots on it and the battery last longer than expected. It is also easy to use in manual mode as well. if your looking for a entry level camera this product is great.
325.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

326.author: Jenn
326.review: This is a GREAT camera. I am a beginner with it but i found lots useful sites to get some cheat cards to help understand a lot of the settings and I just played around with it from there! Once I had it figured out I couldnt believe how clear all the images turned out!
326.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

327.author: Chinmaya
327.review: I had been looking for a best DSLR and was looking to fit that onto my budget. I compared Sony 6000/ Nikon and this one(Canon T6). With the auto Zoom, 2 lenses, handy bag 32gb card, I could not have ever got a better product in $499 on Black Friday. Really Happy on getting this..
327.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

328.author: regus2
328.review: This is my first DSLR camera and I am very happy with it. It has so many great features and takes excellent quality photos.This is a really good camera, easy to use.The image quality is crisp, vibrant and sharp.I would recommend this camera to anyone who is looking for camera.
328.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

329.author: GramKate
329.review: I purchased my first Canon camera in 1984 and it was love at first picture. Since then I've purchased 3 more Canon Cameras: the AE-1 35mm film, then the Canon Rebel was my first digital DSLR camera and now this one. These cameras a reliable, easy to use and take great pictures.
329.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

330.author: Stell22
330.review_title: Great deal; bought it as a gift
330.review: Great reliable brand name! I own 4 Canon cameras. I purchased this complete kit for my son who does not have a DSLR 35mn camera. This was a great deal! In speaking to my son in a roundabout way about a camera, I think he's going to be thrilled with it!
330.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

331.author: Sisty
331.review: I have an older Rebel, but felt it was time to upgrade. This new Canon EOS Rebel T6 is absolutely wonderful to use. I would recommend this to anyone who likes to take photos. You can use it in full auto mode or you can use it choosing your own settings.
331.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

332.author: jasmall2
332.review: I got this as a gift for my wife for capturing the special moments with our little ones. Neither of us has any camera experience beyond the camera on our fun and this camera was easy to use and the features have captured our kids in their glory. worth the purchase
332.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

333.author: ixtimes
333.review:
She recently got into taking artistic photos and this was her graduation present. It has great battery life. She really appreciates the picture quality, even when she zooms in really tight, the picture remains crystal clear. 
This has been a great camera for her.
333.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

334.author: Nandu
334.review: Very easy to use for a beginner like me. Easy connect option to connect directly to your mobile is very helpful. I can operate camera remotely just using my phone. I did not explore much on manual mode. But in auto mode, you just click and picture will come out very nice.
334.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

335.author: Chaz
335.review: Picked up the complete kit on a Cyber Monday deal. Couldn't beat the price for the two lenses, bag, and add one. Direct download to the cell phone is a new feature I thought waliuld be handy occasionally, but I have ended up using it all the time!
335.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

336.author: Moppit
336.review_title: Great for learning and exploring manual.
336.review:
Just getting serious. 
This was my first camera I bought new. All other gear has been used. Great price point. 
Sturdy feel. Little to no flex in body. 18-55 IS good start but plastic mount. 
75-300 good but not IS. 
Overall good value and good product. I love mine
336.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

337.author: Alfred
337.review: I was looking for a camera for my daughter for a college course she was taking. She had previously used this model before and I found this bundle at Best Buy. It included everything she needed for her course except for the SD card.
337.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

338.author: MiamiHeat6
338.review:
The camera is extremely user friendly and is light enough to carry all day with no discomfort.
The picture quality is very good.
I let my grandkids use the camera and they got some exceptional dusk shots.
A good camera and affordable, highly recommend it for the average user
338.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

339.author: Joser
339.review: My wife has always loved taking pictures but never had the right equipment. With this package she took it to the next level. She is taking professional pictures all over San Diego. The pictures are great quality and so many functions that she is still learning.
339.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

340.author: AgentYANNI
340.review: This camera is great as a beginner camera, it has a lot of setting that can be adjusted to fit the amateur photographer. The connection via the wifi with your phone is not bad but has its limitations. Great for transferring photos to you phone. I really like that feature.
340.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

341.author: Rick114
341.review:
Auto option will do most of the work for you. for the more advanced users the manual option is not much different that the old film using SLR cameras. 

Camera body is very light weight and lensed are easy to change out. I would like a larger photo display
341.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

342.author: Ti421
342.review: I have wanted a camera like this for a very long time. So glad I finally took the plunge. It has exceeded my expectations. Glad it came with the two lenses and case. I have already invested in another lense and other accessories to enhance my photography. Recommend this camera.
342.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

343.author: Shantay
343.review: Purchased this camera as a recreational photographer. It's pretty simple to use and takes crisp, clear shots. There's so much to do with this camera and the wifi option makes it convenient to transfer photos on the spot.
343.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

344.author: Twalsh6
344.review: I was lucky enough to get a great deal on my Canon, which included the bag, a lens, and a free Shutterfly 8 x 8 picture book. Even though I am still learning, my camera takes beautiful pictures and upload/editing is very easy through the Canon app for my phone.
344.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

345.author: Mimi
345.review_title: Bought for our grandson for his photography classe
345.review: Purchased this item for our grandson for his online photography classes. He loves the camera and says it is perfect for a novice photographer. He has learned many techniques with his classes and says he is very pleased with the results.
345.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

346.author: GrandmaRoRo
346.review: Heading on a European vacation and wanted to be able to get fantastic pictures. Have never used a digital SLR camera before. Was easy to assemble and change lenses. Great pictures with a little practice.
346.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

347.author: canadaoneday
347.review_title: Great camera for all our needs
347.review: This camera is for our teenager to use to take professional pictures. Our teenager on his own is able to read the directions and apply it to using the camera and it is exactly what he needed and wanted. It's classy and professional
347.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

348.author: tdprice
348.review_title: I love it. Works great and easy to learn
348.review: I have only had it a month, but i love this camera. It is very easy to learn to operate and take great pictures with. I have purchased one additional lens already and probably will more in the future as i get better with my photography. It works perfectly.
348.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

349.author: Sophie
349.review: I purchased the camera as a gift for myself. I love and enjoy photography. It’s a great camera for anyone to be honest. But one and start recording those great moments in your life and then share them on prints or video to those you love.
349.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

350.author: Lou28546
350.review: Upgraded from a T-3 after having it for a couple of years. I’ve always trusted this brand. The T-6 is a great improvement. My other lenses are compatible and I can finally take great shots of the hummingbird in my backyard.
350.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

351.author: MisterPC
351.review: This is an excellent beginner to semi-advanced photographer.. It has tons of features and is pretty intuitive to use. The manual is easy to understand and very comprehensive. I would strongly recommend this camera for the beginning photographer.
351.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

352.author: Xboxo
352.review_title: Canon - EOS Rebel T6 DSLR Camera with EF-S 18-55m
352.review: my first DSLR camera! i fell in love with it! easy to point and shoot! it just takes some time to get use to the settings but once you get the hang of it you'll love it! highly recommend. i bought this camera when it was on sale so that was another plus!
352.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

353.author: Prem
353.review: This is the best camera I have ever bought it takes good pictures and best part is the rapid click all the finest things is captured clearly and it is easy to use the settings are also easy to understand I got great pics with this camera
353.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

354.author: chazz0861
354.review: Purchased this to replace one that was stolen. This is a great camera and easy to use. Takes great pictures. Will know more after the Spring Nationals in April but so far this is a great purchase and several hundred dollars cheaper than the one that it replaced.
354.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

355.author: ksooner10
355.review: This camera takes excellent pictures and is a great deal for the bundle price. I still haven’t taken the time to figure out all of the settings but have taken pics of my sons basketball games and they turned out great!
355.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

356.author: Rachelnan89
356.review: This is the first dslr I've ever purchased or owned. I have really enjoyed using it and getting to know its features. There are a couple things I would change if I could, but for the price it was a great deal! Would definitely purchase over again and suggest to friends.
356.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

357.author: Mars
357.review: I purchased this camera bundle on the employee recommendation. I'm very happy with the purchase. I am a novice with a camera, and this is a great camera system for people like me. Auto focus, wifi/bluetooth image transfers, extra lens, camera bag.
357.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

358.author: Scott
358.review_title: Great camera at a reasonable price
358.review: I purchased this camera for my wife for Christmas. I loved how this bundle included the additional lenses that she was wanting. She opened this on Christmas morning and was floored with the quality and design of this camera. Would definitely recommend this item.
358.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

359.author: Ezie
359.review: Bought this for my older sister and she loves it. I was surprised on hiw much you get in the box. Only thing it didn't come with a SD card which I was bummed about but still loved the camera with its really clear pictures.
359.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

360.author: Photofan
360.review: While I have some experience with DSLRs, I found this camara to be easy to figure out. Im not a manual reading kind of consumer and exploring the features was simple. There were features that I did not know about such as the Canon Connect that i love!
360.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

361.author: Nursecambiker
361.review: Bought this camera for my wedding and had a friend take photos. Completely satisfied with the results. I would totally recommend this camera outfit for anyone looking to start photography or just wanting to have a better quality over their phone.
361.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

362.author: macscamera
362.review_title: This is a great beginner camera
362.review: I really do like this camera. It is self explanatory and easy to use. I like the way that pictures turned out and how they are unique with this camera. I had only bee use to a Nikon in the past and not a Cannon, but I really enjoy my new Cannon.
362.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

363.author: Parag
363.review_title: Best entry level DSLR for Beginners
363.review:
It is easy to shoot, shoots well, and the pictures look much better than most other other brands of cameras. 
This one is Canon's least expensive DSLR, and it works amazingly. 
Highly Recommended for anyone who is looking for a entry level DSLR
363.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

364.author: Marc
364.review: I owned a film SLR Canon camera some years ago. This exceeds that by a long shot. I'm pleased with the focus speed and the picture quality. I do my own printing and am pleased with the enlargement quality.
364.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

365.author: nice
365.review: Nice starter camera for a beginner like myself. Im still learning the ropes of photography in general but this camera takes some awesome shots. Im just learning the different lighting settings and different shoot modes but great camera for a great price with the bundle
365.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

366.author: Rikki66
366.review: I purchased this camera as my first camera. I immediately began taking pictures. The manual was easy to understand and there was plenty of support videos. I would recommend this camera to anyone new to photography.
366.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

367.author: princesstran
367.review: This camera was bought during black Friday sale for my daughter and the price is very reasonable. The Lens will be very useful for distance photos. I can't wait to see my daughter's reaction when she receives this present for Christmas!
367.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

368.author: Catalyn
368.review: I love this camera. It's a great deal with the extra lense and perfect for people just starting out or getting into photography. It was super easy to get the hang of and takes overall great photos. I took it on my trip to Ireland and I never put it down.
368.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

369.author: ac207
369.review: Good package with two useful lenses and case. I like that the camera has wi-fi built in, making it easy to send pics to my phone and to use an app to take photos while using tri-pod. Great entry to the DSLR world.
369.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

370.author: Lisa92
370.review: I love this camera. I am still learning about all the features it offers but, so far the process has been painless. The buttons are well marked and positioned wisely. Camera has a great feel while holding. Very user friendly and enjoying being a new user.
370.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

371.author: Jenn613
371.review: This camera does everything I wanted and so much more! The bundle is a wonderful price and it makes getting started so much easier! I can take the clearest pictures ever and close ups turn out perfect! I couldn't ask for a better camera!
371.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

372.author: Anthony
372.review: Took the camera on vacation and it was better than I expected. It didn't fail to to take the pictures or videos as soon as I hit the button. I will recommend this camera to anyone looking to buy a new one.
372.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

373.author: 132travel2458075
373.review: Bought as a Christmas gift for family member looking to start getting into photography. She loves it and it's exactly what she needed to start learning and have the flexibility in the future to add some more professional lenses than what's included in the kit.
373.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

374.author: Duelist
374.review: First DSLR. It's been very easy to use and takes excellent pics. Auto flash sometimes over whitens a picture, but just switch to no flash mode and you are good to go. Would highly recommend.
374.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

375.author: CrazyK
375.review: The camera is straight forward and easy to use. It comes with an additional lens which provides a ton of capabilities. One stop shop, great case and everything you need to start taking great pictures. Camera takes amazing outdoor and action photos.
375.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

376.author: Lolla10
376.review:
Im a beginner at photography and this was my first big purchase towards that! I am truly in love with the quality of thr camera and the performance 
Its so easy to use. I wpuld definately recommend for a beginner
376.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

377.author: Alex
377.review_title: Great Zoom Lens- SLR is no match to mirrorless
377.review: SLR with Mirrors are heavy but having a steady hand takes great picture. No match to mirror less cameras. If you do not have an SLR already and want to choose between SLR and mirrorless cameras then i recommend to choose this Canon SLR.
377.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

378.author: Joseph
378.review_title: Great Camera for starting a new hobby
378.review: I have been looking to get a higher end camera for some time now. I was absolutely amazed how easy they are to use. The auto focus is as easy as it gets. I have been using it at kids soccer games. I was getting professional action shots the first day.
378.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

379.author: DANI
379.review: I did my research online, saw the special and saw it was available in store. I went to the store on my lunch break and picked up the camera. Super fast friendly service. Camera takes great action shots.
379.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

380.author: JoeCool
380.review: Our son is a wildlife biologist who wanted a good camera for close-up and long-range photography, and this camera fit the bill perfectly. Best Buy had it for a good price, so we made a satisfying purchase of his big Christmas present.
380.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

381.author: 6920Design
381.review: As of yet, no complaints. My favorite feature is being able to link to my iPhone and iPad wirelessly. It has it's own built in Wifi connection. Also like that I can use their app to take the picture, so I am not actually touching the camera to take a photo.
381.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

382.author: Naveen
382.review: I have been looking to purchase DSLR camera from long time. I got this for Thanks giving . Enjoyed the pictures and real value for the money. Great kit and very easy to use. Good for the beginners who wanted to use DSLR. Picture Quality is awesome. Loved it.
382.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

383.author: BrownSugar504
383.review: I've been watching this camera for weeks and when they finally put it in sale I ran and got it. Definitely worth it. I use this as my travel camera and my pro dslr stays home. This camera is light weight and excellent for beginners. Go get this camera now!!!
383.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

384.author: Gardenlady
384.review: I purchased this camera to be able to upgrade from a point and click. Hoping to fine tune my photos of people and places. So far it has done a great job for the purpose I purchased it. Looking forward to learning more about taking great photos.
384.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

385.author: ChristmasGift
385.review_title: Great camera for getting back into photography
385.review: Great camera for getting back into photography. Girlfriend had her camera stolen and stopped photography after that. This was a great starter set for her and gave everything she needed to get back to shooting photos like she use to.
385.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

386.author: Sammy
386.review: I have minimal knowledge of a digital camera but I absolutely love this. It’s very easy to use and there are a lot of videos to watch that can also help you and understand all the different settings
386.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

387.author: Kweave
387.review: I'm still learning about my camera but so far, I absolutely love it!! I have very active children & the action shot preset as well as the telephoto lense have perfect focus. I also love the fact that it can connect to my phone so I can share the pictures!
387.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

388.author: icefishher
388.review: Takes awesome photos, going to Alaska this summer cant wait, battery last for at least 400 pics, took these pics of fushia and china rose just playing
388.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

389.author: Ben1981
389.review: I bought this for my sister. This is a great starter package for those interested in beginning photography. It comes with 2 lenses and s memory card. The telephoto lens is great for wildlife photography.
389.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

390.author: Maerose
390.review: I love this camera so much! I've been wanting a camera like for the longest! A lot of the Best Buy employees told me it doesn't matter what body you get, but the lens matter so if ur looking for size or the body it shouldn't matter because it's all about lens!
390.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

391.author: Maddawgsmom
391.review: Great camera for a beginner! I purchased this camera for my 13 yr old daughter who is an aspiring photographer. She loves it. It will take time for her to understand all the amazing features, but will definitely last her for many years.
391.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

392.author: KWilhelm
392.review_title: Great camera for a beginner or pro
392.review: This is my second DSLR. I love this camera because it is so easy to use with the preset functions. However, if you want to take more advanced pictures, the manual settings are also easy to use. The pictures from this camera are spectacular!
392.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

393.author: Zodiac9thSign
393.review: Impressed with the ease of use, options of picture type and design of this camera. A bundle with tripod to steady shots would be great. Shots can easily be transferred to my mobile.
393.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

394.author: Berta
394.review: I've had my eye on this digital slr model for a few months. Nothing wrong with previous canon DSLR so I was really questioning the *need* of a new DSLR for the wifi upload feature. Black Friday price was just too much to resist. Now I'm so glad I have it.
394.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

395.author: Edward
395.review: I bought this camera to start and get my hands dirty into photography and this camera has been nothing less then amazing. Easy to use, feels great in your hands. Quality of pictures are stunning. I'm no pro at photography but to start, this is a great camera.
395.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

396.author: Blade21x
396.review_title: Good buy if you know nothing about cameras
396.review: I bought this as a Christmas present for my girlfriend who loves photography. I know NOTHING about photograph or cameras and apparently I hit a home-run. She has already used it to take quite a few pictures and I must say the picture quality is amazing.
396.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

397.author: Phelpsb67
397.review: Just started really using my new camera. So far? Well, I absolutely love it. It's def way more complicated than I thought it would be, but that's not a bad thing. Can't wait to learn more, each day.
397.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

398.author: Ritaritz
398.review_title: I love it and very user friendly.
398.review: I did a few target practices at night and was very satisfied with the end results. This was my first time using the Canon Rebel T6 DSLR camera and I really like the quality of the pictures. Also, the accessories that comes with the camera are fantastic.
398.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

399.author: James
399.review: This camera is easy to operate and insert the memory card and the battery. The lens changes easily. Unfortunately the 75-300mm lens received with the package is bad. Going to take it in and hope that they will make it right.
399.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

400.author: moon
400.review: Super camera at a great price. I needed a better camera to take pictures when I travel. Taking a picture with the view finder makes a good pic. But for a great pic you need to see through the lens. Also I can change the lens for any situation
400.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

401.author: Mishi
401.review: I read so many positive reviews of this camera and someone personally recommended it to me but I'm not impressed. It's ok but my phone can take pics just as well without the delay and complicated set-up.
401.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

402.author: Mark
402.review: Bought this prior to an epic vacation to Alaska on a cruise. I'm not a photographer, just wanted some really good picture memories. Camera had two lenses, bag, good bag that fit everything. It worked well and we didnt have any problems.
402.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

403.author: Frannied24
403.review: This camera is absolutely wonderful! Takes great photos and so easy to use! I love the fact that it came with two lenses and price which was on sale was great also! I don't know why we waited so long buy a more professional camera. I love it!
403.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

404.author: Sharon
404.review_title: Easy to use camera for a beginner
404.review: So far it has been easy to work with the camera. The quality of the photos is fantastic and the price was just right. I haven't really been able to put it to use like I would like to but as soon as I do, I'll be sure to update the review!
404.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

405.author: DaveP88
405.review: This camera is a great and easy to use camera for starting to get into photography. The multitude of settings are easy to use right out of the box and a simple video search online provides any additional help that one would need.
405.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

406.author: skeebump
406.review: Supper psyched that my T50 zoom lens works on the DSLR. Super pleased I can set my F stop and "film speed" to get better quality photos than I did with my 35mm. Easy to use, easy to learn if you are a beginner or just a hobbiest.
406.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

407.author: 13crowwe31
407.review: The camera is lightweight, easy to use...manual could be a little easier to understand, but with a little trial and error, it is easy to point & shoot. Video quality very good...no external mike needed...but could be an addition at a later date.
407.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

408.author: Moms
408.review: Great gift for myself. I debated if i should just wait on my gift but after about 2 minutes i knew this was a great deal. I've used it several times and loik forward to capturing photos at my son's lacrosse and football games.
408.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

409.author: Jgranth2
409.review: Great camera for general use. Has point & shoot and manual controls. We use it for vacations and family eventz and works well for us. Can be a bit bulky of you're going to be doing a lot of walking, however.
409.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

410.author: RonLodowski
410.review_title: Does everything which you need in a DSL camera
410.review: I have owned several Canon cameras and I am very happy with my newest purchase. It came with two lenses and camera bag. I am really looking forward to using it to it's full potential on my upcoming vacation.
410.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

411.author: Rexy
411.review: I bought this camera as an upgrade from point-n-shoot and cellphone camera and I got way more power than I expected! The pictures are professional quality and what I love about it the most is how easily you can connect the camera to your cell phone!
411.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

412.author: km65
412.review: I got this as a Black Friday deal and it is a good camera! It takes great pictures and easy to use with many setting options. I enjoy having another lens to use other than the standard. Trying to experiment with it and become a better photographer.
412.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

413.author: Petalguy
413.review: This camera is perfect for the entry level photographer needing a little more control than a basic digital camera. There is a lot this camera can do given the right training. I am impressed with the image quality and ease
413.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

414.author: Annie
414.review_title: Camera for a more advanced photographer
414.review: This camera is a lot more advanced than my old camera. Sorry but I can not give it a complete review because of that. I have not read the manual, or mastered everything. I bought it for the price and the different size lenses.
414.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

415.author: PhilHV
415.review: Unbelievably easy camera to use and enables a novice to take pictures like a professional! The complete package for a low price is unbelievable, especially the zoom lens. You can take this camera anywhere and take unbelievable pictures at any distance.
415.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

416.author: Adam
416.review: So far we love this camera. It is easy to use and takes great pictures. The standard lens is fine but takes similar quality pictures to our newer iPhones. However the zoom lens is outstanding and especially makes it a good deal.
416.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

417.author: Gofrogs
417.review: Bought camera for girlfriend. Never used a camera other than an iPhone or regular point-shoot camera. I am extremely satisfied with the camera quality and durability. Highly recommend for novices and even those needing a camera for sporting events.
417.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

418.author: JayJones007
418.review: Amazing Camera and a great deal with the two lenses. I have since bought 1 more lens for the camera, a 50 MM, but other than that great purchase overall. I’m sure this thing will last me for years to come!
418.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

419.author: Mbrown
419.review: The camera packaging made sure everything was in perfect condition, came with clear instructions on how to properly operate. Easy to function and takes great quality pictures for my purpose. Very pleased with this product. Would purchase again.
419.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

420.author: Sara0327
420.review: I just started a hobby in photography and this is a great DSLR camera to start with. The price is great and the quality is amazing for someone who is just starting and is trying to learn the ins and outs of photography.
420.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

421.author: Backwoods
421.review: My nephew recommended this camera and thought it was a good deal at the price so I bought it I'm still learning how to use it but it takes wonderful pictures and it's fairly easy to use
421.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

422.author: Samia4898
422.review: Bought this camera for my 18 yr old daughter... she wanted it to Vlog, it was very complicated, she got another camera where she can turn the screen in order to see herself while she records. But overall it was an ok camera, great price though.
422.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

423.author: Nisha
423.review: A great camera for a beginner, to learn and explore all the features. The WiFi/nfc is the best feature according to me. I have recommended this to my friends and at least 4 more friends have bought this.
423.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

424.author: Disp
424.review: Great camera. It has a great picture and is reliable. I am a beginner photographer using the for hobbies and it is a blast. I might have gone with the T6i for the moving screen if there wasn't a deal that included the bad and extra lens for the T6.
424.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

425.author: Firstdpt
425.review: This was my first camera purchase I looked online and saw the reviews so I purchase it I think it was a great decision so far it is pretty easy to use and I am liking the pictures
425.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

426.author: lihemma
426.review: The package is a nice deal for a beginner. The camera bag is nice, as well as the extra lens. Having 2 lenses increases the versatility and uses of the camera. Having the memory card included made it a great gift with everything needed included.
426.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

427.author: Chris
427.review: I have an older cannon eos rebel camera that my eldest son has taken up for his hobby. This camera is the one he liked because of it's capabilities that go beyond my older camera. Can't wait to see how far his hobby goes.
427.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

428.author: Retiring2018
428.review_title: Great camera with a beginners learning curve.
428.review: I needed a camera that I could take medium to long distance shots. I used it in two large arenas for my daughters awards ceremony and then again for graduation. Got some very good pictures and this with just 30 minutes familiarization.
428.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

429.author: CannonBlast
429.review: I bought this camera for my sister as a present. It has a very easy layout and has excellent image quality. Be careful not to use flash all the time (This is mainly for beginners using strictly auto-settings...) as it leads to red eye.
429.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

430.author: Technerdie
430.review: I looked into a lot of different options, and I finally landed on this one. It does everything I need to do as far as beginning photography. It also comes with a great starter pack. Really good low light and pretty good long exposure.
430.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

431.author: Heychiinax
431.review: This is such a good camera for not only pictures but for filming too! I went to a birthday party at the skating rink and I used the sports option to take pictures while my family was skating and it turned out so beautiful
431.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

432.author: diego
432.review: I have been doing photography for about 3 years. I have been working with the Canon T6, and this one is a wonderful starter and Advanced camera, depending how you use it. I would recommend this to anyone thinking about!
432.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

433.author: Stackin
433.review: The Camera is great for a beginner camera, if you are just trying to get into it, this camera should last you your first few years. Great camera for the price
433.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

434.author: dbuck217
434.review_title: Great Deal on a Cannon with extra lens
434.review: SO far my wife's been extremely happy with her new Rebel. She's getting her Masters in Landscape Architecture and need a camera that would take high quality pictures for editing in her designs and has been very pleased with the results.
434.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

435.author: Gogogo
435.review: Purchased this camera for my son for Christmas after visiting the store and discussing different models with associate. Also did research online and talked to a professional photographer. He loves it and it takes awesome pictures!!
435.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

436.author: cvn65cmdboy
436.review: I BOUGHT THIS AT A STEAL OF A PRICE, AND WOW WAS I IMPRESSED! THIS THING TAKES PHENOMENAL PHOTOS AND THE SELF ADJUSTING FEATURES ARE GREAT! NOT TO MENTION BEST BUT OFFERS FREE PHOTO TAKING COURSES! WHAT MORE COULD YOU ASK FOR?
436.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

437.author: Woodkarver78
437.review: i have a nikon which i got because of the larger pic size, but the auto-focus is giving me problems. I missed shots becasue it didn't work and the camera wouldn't "fire". I bought this canon and haven't had any problems
437.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

438.author: Cindy
438.review: Camera takes beautiful shots. Relatively easy to use. This is the first "good" camera I bought. I had (have) one of the first Canon Sure Shots from years ago. This Rebel follows Canon's fine reputation. Very happy with it!
438.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

439.author: avidreader
439.review: Bought this camera to replace my more advanced camera that malfunctioned during a cruise. Did not like the controls initially, but after I used it for a while, found it easy to adjust and it took surprising good pictures.
439.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

440.author: mgc333
440.review: My parents and I got this deal for my little sister over Christmas and she loves it! It's perfect for her and amazing quality pictures. At first I was hesitant over the price but you receive two not one but two great lens! Really good deal.
440.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

441.author: Rickkid007
441.review: This camera is perfect. It has all the features that other cameras have and this one costs less. I bought it with the 75mm lens and use it every time I go hiking, camping or even any family event and take as many pictures as I can.
441.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

442.author: Oscar
442.review: This is my first DSLR and I’m thoroughly impressed with the picture quality and ease of use. My only gripe is it’s unwillingness at times to connect to my iPhone for transferring pics. I highly recommend this camera.
442.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

443.author: Krisu
443.review: This is an amazing kit for the money. Having wifi and being able to upload your picture to your phone and online in seconds is a big plus. Overall camera takes wonderful pictures and as of now have not found anything that's a negative to me.
443.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

444.author: Jose
444.review: I've been wanting to get one of these cameras for a while and boy am I glad I did! I took pictures of my sons first soccer game this season and boy what great pictures it takes and not to mention the sale price I got it for!!!
444.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

445.author: PG45
445.review: Got a good deal on the purchase because of the additional telephoto lens included in the purchase and the camera is very easy to use. The memory card slides right into my laptop for downloading the pictures. I am really enjoyed using the camera..
445.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

446.author: Mine
446.review: Seems just the right camera for a college freshman very interested in all things "artistic." She is just beginning to use. Her Aunt suggested we pick this camera as she purchased this same camera several months ago for herself and loves it.
446.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

447.author: Allieb
447.review: this kit is great for beginners because it comes with the camera one lands and then an extra lien fits great for close-up shots. The picture quality is astounding and the features are easy to use the product manual is very helpful
447.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

448.author: TTed
448.review: Purchased to have "better then phone" option for taking pictures. works well, relatively easy to use with some advanced options. Battery seems to last decent amount of time.
448.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

449.author: Bill
449.review: Super camera outfit, especially for novices. We were able to take good pictures on automatic and didn't have to worry about a thing, except where the sun was shining.
449.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

450.author: JMerlo
450.review: I bought this for my wife as a starter camera and she couldn't me more thrilled with the simplicity and quality in one package. The ruggedness has been understated and has been an excellent addition to our daily lives.
450.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

451.author: GotIt
451.review: This camera is great right out of the bag. I've never used a camera, besides my phone and this thing is super easy to use. Hooks right up to my phone no wifi needed. I can take a picture and post to social media or send it to a friend.
451.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

452.author: FICX
452.review: An awesome outfit for beginners that has the lens power to do everything from closeup work to bird photography. If you have other Canon lenses as I do, it is a nice addition to my system.
452.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

453.author: Donco
453.review: I bought this camera for my son - he absolutely loves it! It is easy to use and takes the most beautiful pictures . The fact that it comes with 2 lenses and a camera bag makes it an exceptional valve . Highly recommended
453.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

454.author: Customer
454.review: For what we needed it for it is a great camera. We are not pros just wanted to take good action shots of our kids sports and the iPhones camera wasn't doing it. Nice price for what we got on sale. Couldn't beat the price and quality.
454.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

455.author: LuvMyLens
455.review_title: Great Camera For A Beginner. Love The Wi Fi Featu
455.review:
Comfortable and Easy To Use For A Beginner. It's My 1st Big Purchase Of Camera. 
Perfect For Taking My First Photography Class.
455.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

456.author: DRJdds
456.review_title: Excellent camera for young and old
456.review: I strongly recommend purchasing this product from Best Buy staff was very friendly and the warranty options of your important to me they seem to have the best arrangement for taking care of any issues I may have with this product
456.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

457.author: mgmtsol
457.review_title: Great camera for a great price
457.review: picked this camera to start photography again and it seriously has not failed me... the extra lens bundle is also a real nice touch. Canon has great products and pretty sturdy hardware... it's a great buy!
457.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

458.author: Thomas
458.review_title: My wife was presently surprised and loves it
458.review: My wife loves taking pictures and this camera is very easy to use. "Point and shoot" as she would say. She was amazed how sharp the pictures are and she is looking forward to action shots of our son playing football in the fall next year.
458.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

459.author: linc
459.review: This camera is loaded with features for close-ups as well as landscapes. It is my first Canon buy, so will use it a lot on vacation this summer. It was on sale as a package, so I got a bag, card, battery, charger and an extra lens!
459.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

460.author: JimJ
460.review: If bought separately the items in this kit probably would have been double Best Buy's price. Terrific camera. Better than the Canon and Pentax cameras that I had back in the "60s.
460.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

461.author: Calico
461.review_title: The best crop sensor dslr for the money.
461.review: Have been a fan of the rebel series for a long time, this is now my second T6 (one T6s, 1 T6i) and are amazing for a back up camera for the professional photographer. Great addition to the canon line.
461.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

462.author: Unsatisfied
462.review: I purchased my Canon Rebel T6 a year ago because I wanted to start my own photography business. I've been pleased for a starter camera it has worked very well and my clients have been pleased with their photos.
462.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

463.author: TBOY
463.review: Good camera but did not get my photo album. It is a great camera, you will need to take a lot of time to set up. Also to learn each section. But it is easy for a beginner. You will love your pictures. And learn to make them even beater..
463.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

464.author: Erica
464.review: My husband and I got this camera to take our maternity photos, and so we could have a nice family camera after our son is born. Pics came.out great couldn't be happier with the camera it was a great deal for the whole package
464.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

465.author: Bert
465.review: This is my second Cannon. Got this at a really good price to replace the last camera that I gave to my son. This one has even more features than the old one. I would recommend it
465.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

466.author: maddie
466.review: I’ve used this camera before in a photography class, and I finally bought my own. It’s really easy to use, takes good quality pictures (including in RAW format, which is great!!) and is definitely worth the price!
466.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

467.author: Hsmckay
467.review: I bought this to replace my T3. It has been a pleasure to use, I especially enjoy using with my 50mm lens, produces great photographs. This is an excellent camera for amateurs, or as a second camera
467.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

468.author: Jerseygirl032971
468.review_title: Love my camera cannon rebel T6
468.review:
I didn't buy the latest version because I got an extra lens and a case as part of a bundle pack. For my needs this camera is perfect. I LOVE the wifi feature where I can send my
Photos directly to my phone or my laptop.
468.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

469.author: Soupnotzi
469.review: I got this camera for my 13 year old daughter who wanted to take more professional photos. Compared to the other Canon models, the built in wifi was more important to her so that she could easily communicate with her iPhone.
469.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

470.author: Diegogamer

470.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

471.author: nikasperspective
471.review: This camera is awesome if you are starting out as a photographer or maybe just want a simple dslr camera. The bundle is a great deal. Personally I have used and enjoyed both lens.
471.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

472.author: rippledserenity

472.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

473.author: Swampfox

473.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

474.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

475.author: John

475.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

476.author: Nate
476.review: My wife was looking for a camera upgrade and we saw this great deal at Best Buy. If you know anything about cameras you know that it is largely preference based but the lighter body and incredible resolution of photos has been amazing.
476.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

477.author: zaga143
477.review_title: Nice deal - Nice camera for perfect price paid!
477.review: It is my very first DSLR camera which I bought in very good price as compared to Nikon brand and it is good than mirrorless types due to lenses. It is good for taking personal photos during vacations and am enjoying by taking photos with it.
477.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

478.author: Mikese10
478.review: Good Entry Camera for Non professional but with awesome professional looking shots. Good Bundle..wish I waited to holiday season for these great deals
478.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

479.author: Diegogamer

479.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

480.author: sonofrags1952

480.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

481.author: DieHardFan
481.review_title: For an upgrade above a phone cam this is it

481.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

482.author: Mike
482.review_title: Good camera package for the price
482.review: New to cameras that you can switch lenses on! Me too. If you’d like more flexabilty than a point and shoot camera, and want to start learning about photography, this Canon pakage fits the bill.
482.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

483.author: RobotLee
483.review: Arrived quickly and securely packaged. I also upgraded by purchasing additional batteries and a higher capacity memory card. It's a gift, so have not accessed all the features, functionality specifications yet.
483.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

484.author: CVoo
484.review: Comes with all the basics, camera is easy to pick up and start using. Makes a “know nothing” kind of user look like they’ve taken a few classes. Manual is easy to read to get you started, takes great photos.
484.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

485.author: Shelly
485.review:
Bought this as a Christmas gift for my daughter
 She always had a point and shoot camera. When she opened this on christmas morning she was so happy. And the price was great to. Takes great pictures and is easy to learn how to use.
485.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

486.author: Poncho
486.review: First camera with two interchangeable lenses for me really easy to use , I went to cascade caverns and I was able to get beautiful pictures great definition, I need to get extra flash for dark places.
486.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

487.author: Lilpharoah

487.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

488.review_title: I believe this is a great camera for a beginner.
488.review: I've looked at so many other cameras before I got this one. I asked professional photographers their opinion and they each told me to go with this one. I got a great deal on it during Black Friday and have been using it ever since.
488.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

489.author: Joey
489.review: I have always been into photography have never owned a DSLR camera till now, and I love it. You can go check out my photography on Instagram. Most pictures were taken with this camera!! @joe_michael_nelson
489.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

490.author: Lola
490.review_title: Brought my daughter to tears xmas morning
490.review: We all sat there in shock when my 13yr old opened the package and started crying. We soon realized they were tears of joy - she did not think she was getting her one and only wish. Great pics, great camera.
490.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

491.author: Sspdfreek
491.review: The camera is easy to set up and the bundle came with a very nice case, two lenses, and a memory card. It takes excellent outdoor photos and switching between the multiple modes couldn't be simpler.
491.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

492.author: DeeMitch
492.review: Great Camera for beginners. Very easy to use and upload onto phone if you want to post to Social media. I would highly recommend this camera to anyone who is looking for a great camera at an reasonable price.
492.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

493.author: Bopanna
493.review: After reading lot of reviews I purchased this product as I am a amateur in photography....this camera is really good for amateurs as functions are user friendly and easy to transfer photos to your mobile through WiFi... good product
493.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

494.author: Sapp
494.review: Camera is good. Have not used. Bought it as a gift and tried to return it without it being opened and they told me no due to it being outside of the 15 day period. This will be the last thing I buy from Best Buy.
494.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

495.author: blackjack
495.review_title: Great Camera even the teenage grandkids loved it
495.review: Great Camera my husband loves it took it on Vacation Xmas and the whole family loved it especially the teenage Grand kids they used it as much as he did he's still learning all the things he can do with it.
495.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

496.author: BigJake1979
496.review: This is a good camera and a fair price. If you are looking for great overall family or photography starter camera this if for you. If you are a pro I would guess probably to basic for you but you would probably already know that.
496.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

497.author: Ash10116
497.review: I have tried many different brand name cameras and by far this one is one of the best I have ever used and owned. It has so many features and is great for beginners and the more advanced. Best bang for the buck!!
497.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

498.author: BestBuyFan
498.review: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my daughter. Great value and a really good camera. She is a beginner but wants to take photography seriously and has been learning the camera and doing wonderful with it. Definitely recommend

499.author: Muhaimin
499.review: This camera is pretty good for its price range. I took some sample photos right after i got my hands on it and the picture quality turns out really good. My advice is buy a 50 mm lens to get great looking pictures.
499.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

500.author: Cressticles

500.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

501.author: Aws1927
501.review: I decided to get this camera based on other reviews. I have developed an interest in photography, and decided to try this camera. I am still familiarizing myself with all the features it has to offer. I'm sure it will be an experience.
501.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

502.author: Lela

502.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

503.author: Jessica
503.review: Amazing quality camera. Captures clear pictures with one click of a button. The lenses provided work flawlessly when close up or far away. The manual focus definitely saves time when trying to capture that perfect picture!
503.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

504.author: phillr3
504.review:
Very pleased with product. Had to spend a few minutes using instructions and have greatly enjoyed using camera. It's fun to look at the pics and see my improvement. 
You will not be sorry with this item.
504.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

505.author: Maeganc90
505.review: I love this camera so much! Takes amazing pictures and has some really awesome features. I’ve been wanting one for a long time, so I finally broke down and bought myself one and I’m glad I chose this one.
505.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

506.author: Momof3boys
506.review: Wonderful camera and takes great pictures and it an easy camera to learn to use. Still working on learning how to use the manual features. But takes great pictures in auto mode.
506.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

507.author: johnny
507.review: Have always had canon products and upgrade every few years. Dependable and consistent. All lenses I have bought over the years work with all of the cameras I have owned from the rebel film to the current T6.

508.author: SueH
508.review_title: Great camera for a beginner or the seasoned pro!
508.review: My husband and I bought this Canon Rebel with gift money from our 40th Anniversary party given by our sons and family...it is fabulous! We learn something new every day!
508.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

509.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

510.author: Sher
510.review_title: Camera for son in photography class

510.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

511.author: ChrisP
511.review: Bought this because it was a great buy for the price. We are very satisfied with it.Needed a better camera than the small digital we had. Wanted one that was easy to use.This is what we were looking for.

512.author: Srikanth
512.review: This is very useful camera for the people who are learning the photography and want to explore the world with a DSLR. Lightweight and compact. 70-300 mm adds value to the camera body to take close up shots
512.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

513.author: CCBandD
513.review: Nice combination package deal with the 2 lenses and purchased at a good price. 2nd Cannon Rebel I've owned. Simple to use and takes great shots. Added features from my old model (Rebel xsi) and looking forward to use them more.
513.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

514.author: Beee
514.review: Great camera for a beginner... even a professional. But being a beginner this was still easy to use, learn and get amazing quality photos, the Battery life is great to!
514.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

515.author: Liss
515.review_title: Good product for a good price
515.review: I bought the camera to take pictures of my newborn :) I’m very satisfied with this camera. It is easy to use and very practical to carry wherever you go.
515.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

516.author: Kitkat2017
516.review: I used to have several SlRs before they were stolen years ago. Technology has changed a lot since then, and I haven't retained information well. This is great for getting back into the game.
516.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

517.author: Lilco
517.review: I'm very satisfied with this camera and it many features. It has wi fi. It downloads directly to your phone or other devices. It can be operated by phone and can remotely operate a flash device. It is a great intro into photos.

518.author: Anya

518.review: This camera is my first camera. It's easy to learn and use and it takes great pictures. The extra lens, I don't use, the reviews aren't so great on it either. If you're looking for a great beginner camera, this is a good choice!

519.author: BwayFan22
519.review: I’ve been wanting to get a DSLR camera for years but just now took the leap. Still learning to use it, but my first quick test run was great. Much better quality photos than my point and shoot camera.

520.author: ypooooooo
520.review: Great camera for someone just starting out taking pictures. I was in-between the Nikon and the Cannon but I liked how simple the cannons commands and buttons are. Highly recommend this camera for anyone.

521.author: dave2156
521.review: This Canon ranks right up there with the best professional cameras you can buy. It has a full range of options to get the shots you want. The price was amazing for what is the best camera I have owned to date.

522.author: a1arunner

522.review: I bought the Canon Rebel T6 for my college age daughter and she loves it. She says it is easy to learn to use, she loves the Wi-Fi feature, and the battery life is good. Great camera for her and she has already used it often.
